title: Don Quijote
author: Miguel de Cervantes
description: You should join Don Quijote and Sancho Panza on their journey.

title: Dune
author: Frank Herbert
description: It is evident that both 'Dune' and 'God Emperor of Dune' are works of great literary merit.

title: Woman
author: Charles Bukowski
description: It will trigger something. Something will happen. It will happen in you.
